title: Generator options with duplicate values get messed up in test helper
body:
### Steps to reproduce
<!-- (Guidelines for creating a bug report are [available
here](https://edgeguides.rubyonrails.org/contributing_to_ruby_on_rails.html#creating-a-bug-report)) -->

<!-- Paste your executable test case created from one of the scripts found [here](https://edgeguides.rubyonrails.org/contributing_to_ruby_on_rails.html#create-an-executable-test-case) below: -->
```ruby
require "bundler/inline"

gemfile(true) do
  source "https://rubygems.org"

  git_source(:github) { |repo| "https://github.com/#{repo}.git" }

  gem "rails", github: "rails/rails", branch: "main"
end

require "rails/generators"
require "minitest/autorun"

class MyGenerator < Rails::Generators::NamedBase
  class_option :option1, type: :string, required: false, desc: "Option 1"
  class_option :option2, type: :string, required: false, desc: "Option 2"

  def create_dummy_file
    create_file "#{options[:option1]}.txt", options[:option2]
  end
end

class BugTest < Rails::Generators::TestCase
  tests MyGenerator

  destination Dir.mktmpdir

  def test_allows_duplicate_option_values
    run_generator(["foo", "--option1", "some_value", "--option2", "some_value"])

    assert_file "some_value.txt" do |content|
      assert_equal "some_value", content
    end
  end
end
```

### Expected behavior
When passing multiple options with the same value each option should have that value.

### Actual behavior
Each option gets the correct value.

This appears to be an accidental side effect of some changes in https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/33079 - specifically https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/33079/commits/7d1aebdbe046f2867f53a4247caecf8a0d20e721#diff-4f64468b3db0280d6802389b9a019059fa04609c387fab17b5738081b0f2ab75R70-R71. It appears that the intention was to not duplicate the `--skip-*` options but the unintended consequence was removing any option values that were duplicates.

I'm planning on opening a PR to address this shortly.

### System configuration
**Rails version**: main

**Ruby version**: 3.1.2
